content.prompt: In the context of the passage as a whole, the first paragraph serves to build suspense by

choices.label: hinting at the political machinations underlying the partyâ€™s spectacular failure
emphasizing the extent to which the success of the party hinges on seemingly unimportant details
alluding to the international significance of issues that will be resolved at the party
dwelling on the elaborate preparations for an event whose disruption is imminent

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
